s2_text: Control your HomeKit-enabled accessories with your voice using Siri.
s3_text: Apple HomeKit technology provides advanced security with end-to-end encryption and authentication between a HomeKit-enabled accessory and your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch.
s4_text: With the Koogeek Home app, you can set custom schedules and timers for a light bulb or a scene to meet your daily routine.
s5_text: Scenes enable you to control multiple accessories at the same time. Use a suggested scene or create a custom one.
s6_text: Turn a scene on or off by tapping it, setting a schedule/timer or just asking Siri.
s7_text: Monitor real-time, daily and monthly electric power consumption via the app.
s8_text: You can set up your Apple TV or iPad as a home hub to control your HomeKit accessories remotely, grant access, and automate your accessories.
s9_text: Screw it into your existing Edison style light socket, then screw any standard bulb into it.
s10_text: Compatible with your existing standard Edison style E26/E27 light bulbs, up to 25 watts.
